# Train Booking System (Java + MySQL + Swing)

## Requirements
- Java JDK 17+
- MySQL 8+
- MySQL Connector/J (in `lib/` folder)
- VS Code or IntelliJ

## Setup
1. Create database:
```sql
CREATE DATABASE train_booking;
USE train_booking;
-- Import tables from `db/schema.sql`
